articles.author: Petrana Radulovic
articles.title: Turning Red review: Pixar’s emotional action movie is one of its best - Polygon
articles.description: Pixar’s Turning Red, from Bao director Domee Shi, is a great film that embraces quirkiness, Asian-American life, and big action. The movie releases on Disney Plus on March 11. Here’s how to tell if it’s for you and the kids in your life.
articles.content: At this point, the Pixar movie stereotype has become a meme: People go into the animation studios projects expecting a family-friendly story focused on non-human protagonists given surprising depth a… [+5526 chars]

articles.title: COVID Vaccines - What Happened to 'Safe and Effective'? - American Thinker
articles.description: COVID vaccines were developed in record time, one might say at “warp speed,” the name of the operation instituted by President Trump in 2020. We were assured by those in whom we place trust that these vaccines were “safe and ef...
